name: Consumer Banking
description: Provides basic banking services to individuals, including checking and savings accounts, credit cards, personal loans, and mortgages.

name: Corporate Banking
description: Offers customized financial solutions to large corporations, including cash management, trade finance, and risk management services.

name: Investment Banking
description: Provides advisory services on mergers and acquisitions, equity and debt capital markets, and leveraged finance to corporations and governments.

name: Wealth Management
description: Offers investment advice, portfolio management, and estate planning services to high net worth individuals and families.

name: Asset Management
description: Manages investment portfolios on behalf of individuals, institutions, and corporations, offering a range of investment products and strategies.

name: Private Banking
description: Provides personalized financial services, including investment management, credit, and wealth transfer planning, to high net worth individuals and families.

name: Card Services
description: Issues and processes credit and debit cards, offering payment solutions to consumers and merchants.

name: Transaction Banking
description: Provides cash management, trade finance, and securities services to corporations, governments, and financial institutions.

name: Mortgage Banking
description: Originates, services, and securitizes residential and commercial mortgages, offering loan products to consumers and investors.

name: Insurance
description: Offers life, health, property, and casualty insurance products to individuals and businesses, providing risk management solutions.

name: Digital Banking
description: Provides online and mobile banking services, enabling customers to manage their finances, make payments, and access financial products digitally.

name: Payment Processing
description: Facilitates electronic payment transactions, including credit card processing, online payments, and mobile wallets.

name: Risk Management
description: Helps financial institutions manage risk through services such as risk assessment, mitigation, and compliance.

name: Fintech
description: Develops innovative financial technology solutions, including blockchain, artificial intelligence, and data analytics, to improve financial services.
